name: 5th Annual Pharma Packaging, Labelling, Serialisation, Track & Trace 2023
content: 5th Pharma Packaging, Labelling, Serialisation, Track & Trace 2023 02nd August 2023, Hotel Kohinoor Continental, Mumbai, India After another successful year, a special thank you to all our attendees from our previous Pharma Packaging and Labelling Conference. Virtue Insight is delighted to announce the 5th Annual Pharma Packaging, Labelling, Serialization, Track & Trace 2023 conference to be held on 10th August 2023, Kohinoor Continental Hotel, Mumbai, India. The 2023 agenda looks at ongoing regulations, end-to-end artwork, sustainability, serialization, e-labelling and patient safety. Top pharmaceutical companies, biotechs, CMOs and regulatory bodies and many more will come together to share their insights into compliant packaging and labelling implementation. Please contact me at E-mail - kavitha@virtueinsight.co.in or Call +91 9361957193 DELEGATE REGISTRATION: Early Bird Price (Valid Till 22nd June 2023) - INR 11,000 + GST (18%) per delegate Standard Price (Valid From 23rd June 2023) - INR 15,000 + GST (18%) per delegate We have more sponsorship opportunities available for the event, which gives you an opportunity to exhibit/booth/speak and create brand awareness.
